thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Seiwa Electric Mfg. to issue and distribute shares to raise 593.1 mln yen

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Seiwa Electric Mfg. to issue and distribute shares to raise 593.1 mln yen

organizations.name: reuters) - seiwa electric mfg. co ltd

text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Seiwa Electric Mfg. Co Ltd
* Says it will issue 700,000 new shares and distribute 200,000 shares of its treasury common stock, via public offering
* Says it will issue 165,000 new shares via private placement, subscription date on March 27 and payment date on March 28
* Says it will aims to raise 593.1 million yen in total, to use for capital investment and loan repayment
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/hvPPNp
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
